abcd21:TechnicalContact.abcd21:Name: Gabi Droege
abcd21:TechnicalContact.abcd21:Address: Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin-Dahlem, Königin-Luise-Str.6-8, 14195 Berlin, Germany

abcd21:ContentContact.abcd21:Name: Dr. Jörg Plötner
abcd21:ContentContact.abcd21:Address: Museum für Naturkunde – Leibniz Institute for Evolution and Biodiversity Science, Invalidenstraße 43, 10115 Berlin, Germany

abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Title: DNA Bank of Museum für Naturkunde (MfN)
abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Details: The DNA bank of Museum für Naturkunde holds currently a collection of about 40,000 DNA samples and 1,500 tissue samples of animals (predominately molluscs, shrimps, grasshoppers, bats and frogs). Most samples come from SE Asia, tropical Africa, and Europe.

abcd21:Representation.abcd21:Text: Museum für Naturkunde - Leibniz Institute for Evolution and Biodiversity Science

abcd21:Copyright.abcd21:Text: The copyright for any material created by the DNA bank of the MfN is reserved. The duplication or use of information and data such as texts or images is only permitted with the indication of the source or with prior approval by MfN.

abcd21:TermsOfUse.abcd21:Text: The use of the data is allowed only for non-profit scientific use and for non-profit nature conservation purpose. The data bases or part of it may only be used or copied by the written permission from the legal owner.

HTTP parameter 'request' used for building the request.
Try to get CMF for namespace http://www.tdwg.org/schemas/abcd/2.1
Executing SQL: 'SELECT DISTINCT tissues.ID_Collection FROM wrapper_view_specimens AS tissues ORDER BY tissues.ID_Collection LIMIT 51 offset 3650'

Executing SQL: 'SELECT tissues.ID_Collection, metadata.TechnicalContactName, metadata.TechnicalContactEmail, metadata.TechnicalContactAddress, metadata.ContentContactName, metadata.ContentContactEmail, metadata.ContentContactAddress, metadata.DatasetTitle, metadata.DatasetDetails, metadata.OwnerLogoURI, metadata.DateModified, metadata.OwnerOrganizationName, metadata.OwnerAddress, metadata.OwnerEmail, metadata.OwnerURI, metadata.CopyrightText, metadata.TermsOfUseText, metadata.CitationsText, tissues.InstitutionCode_Specimen, tissues.CollectionCode_Specimen, tissues.UnitID_Specimen, sptoolhighertaxon.HigherTaxon, sptoolhighertaxon.TaxonRank, sptooltaxa.NameAuthorYear, sptooltaxa.PreferredFlag, sptooltaxa.Identifier, sptooltaxa.IdentificationDate, tissues.BasisOfRecord, tissues.KindOfUnit, tissues.Blocked_For_Loaning, tissues.AcquiredFrom, tissues.PreparationType, tissues.PreparationDate, tissues.Locality_ID, tissues.CollectionDateMin, tissues.CollectionDateMax, tissues.Collectors, tissues.ExpeditionDetails, tissues.Locality, tissues.CountryName, tissues.CountryISO2, tissues.ContinentOrOcean, tissues.LongitudeDecimal, tissues.LatitudeDecimal, tissues.AltitudeMin, tissues.AltitudeMax, tissues.AltitudeUnit, tissues.DepthMin, tissues.DepthMax, tissues.DepthUnit, tissues.Habitat, tissues.CollectorsNo, tissues.Sex, metadata.MetadataID, tissues.ID_Collection, sptoolhighertaxon.ID_HigherTaxon, sptooltaxa.ID_TaxonIdentified FROM abcdmetadataspecimens AS metadata, wrapper_view_specimens AS tissues LEFT JOIN sptooltaxa AS sptooltaxa ON (sptooltaxa.FK_Collection = tissues.ID_Collection) LEFT JOIN sptoolhighertaxon AS sptoolhighertaxon ON (sptoolhighertaxon.FK_TaxonIdentified = sptooltaxa.ID_TaxonIdentified) WHERE (tissues.ID_Collection IN (60975, 60976, 60977, 60978, 60979, 60980, 60981, 60982, 60983, 60984, 60985, 60986, 60987, 60988, 60989, 60990, 60991, 60992, 60993, 60994, 60995, 60996, 60997, 60998, 60999, 61000, 61001, 61002, 61003, 61004, 61005, 61006, 61007, 61008, 61009, 61010, 61011, 61012, 61013, 61014, 61015, 61016, 61017, 61018, 61019, 61020, 61021, 61022, 61023, 61024)) ORDER BY tissues.ID_Collection'
